mods.abstract: Correspondence discusses matters relating to the Naval Base at Jufair, Bahrain, in the context of the redeployment of the naval stations at Henjam and Basidu on the Persian side of the Gulf.The topics include:Lists of persons employed at Jufair naval base.Arrangements for demarcating fish traps due to relocation of naval pier.Plan showing position of stake relative to Jufair Pier Light (folio 16A).Arrangements for entry into the naval base at Jufair including the 'naturs' system of night watchmen.Orders for Naturs at Jufair Naval Base.Correspondents include:; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser, Bahrain Government; Superintendent, Land Registration Department, Bahrain Government; Clerk-in-charge, Naval Base, Bahrain; Atiytulla Abdulrahman al-Khalifa; George Ashmead Cole, Political Agent, Bahrain.
